entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
